hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin Buraidah:It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Buraidah that his father said: "Abu Bakr and 'Umar, may Allah be pleased with them, proposed marriage to Fatimah but the Messenger of Allah said: 'She is young.' Then 'Ali proposed marriage to her and he married her to him

chapter.ara-name: باب تَزَوُّجِ الْمَرْأَةِ مِثْلَهَا فِي السِّنِّ .
chapter.eng-name: A Woman Marrying Someone Who Is Similar In Age to Her
